metadata.name: Self_reSPEKt
metadata.description: This is my take on Self. The image from the front is the same; I feel as an artist and a person, I must put my best self forward. As we rotate beyond the profile horizon, we see a mass of random balls floating and in a chaotic pattern. I personally feel this sort of chaos in my life; even though I have a front and a direction, there is also chaos. Spherical objects were chosen as a basis. The make up of our being is spherical. I believe at the bottom of our core, down to the smallest atom, our nature is spherical in shape. The triangle is because I believe that our life is always changing. Delta resonates with me because in a troubled world we can always look up to the heavens. Purple is because our world is very beautiful. With that, it can also be full of passion and become a dangerous place. The cracks that form on the outer shell represent hardship and trials that I have faced. The music and light inside are there to express how we can make it through tough times together.
